title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.5 - Provisions of service contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.5 - Provisions of service contracts

State Regulations
(a) Every service contract marketed, issued, sold or offered for sale, made or offered to be made, or administered in this State shall specify any limitations on the right to terminate the service contract by the provider or contract holder and to receive a refund of the provider fee. (b) The notice required by section
7905 (f)
of the Insurance Law, regarding prior approval of repair work and emergency assistance, if applicable, shall be set forth in a conspicuous manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
390.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
